titleStmt.title: A second call to a farther humiliation being a sermon preached the 24th of Novemb. last past / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Herbert, Lord Bishop of Hereford, in his Cathedral Church of Hereford.
titleStmt.author: Croft, Herbert, 1603-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
